-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Parsing and printing SMT-LIB.
--   
--   SMT-LIB is a common language used by many SMT solvers. This library
--   provides an SMT-LIB AST with parsing and printing utilities.
@package smt-lib
@version 0.0.2

module Language.SMTLIB.Lexer
data Token
Numeral :: Integer -> Token
Decimal :: Double -> Token
Hex :: String -> Token
Bin :: String -> Token
String :: String -> Token
Symbol :: String -> Token
Keyword :: String -> Token
LeftParen :: Token
RightParen :: Token
lexSMTLIB :: String -> [Token]
alexScanTokens :: String -> [Token]
alexAndPred :: (t -> t1 -> t2 -> t3 -> Bool) -> (t -> t1 -> t2 -> t3 -> Bool) -> t -> t1 -> t2 -> t3 -> Bool
alexPrevCharIs :: Eq a => a -> t -> (a, t3) -> t1 -> t2 -> Bool
alexPrevCharIsOneOf :: Ix i => Array i e -> t -> (i, t3) -> t1 -> t2 -> e
alexRightContext :: Int -> Any -> t -> t1 -> AlexInput -> Bool
iUnbox :: Int -> Int#
alexInputPrevChar :: (t, t1) -> t
instance Eq Token
instance Show Token


-- | Parsing and printing SMT-LIB.
module Language.SMTLIB
type Numeral = Integer
type Symbol = String
type Keyword = String
data Spec_constant
Spec_constant_numeral :: Numeral -> Spec_constant
Spec_constant_decimal :: Rational -> Spec_constant
Spec_constant_hexadecimal :: String -> Spec_constant
Spec_constant_binary :: [Bool] -> Spec_constant
Spec_constant_string :: String -> Spec_constant
data S_expr
S_expr_constant :: Spec_constant -> S_expr
S_expr_symbol :: Symbol -> S_expr
S_expr_keyword :: Keyword -> S_expr
S_exprs :: [S_expr] -> S_expr
data Identifier
Identifier :: Symbol -> Identifier
Identifier_ :: Symbol -> [Numeral] -> Identifier
data Sort
Sort_bool :: Sort
Sort_identifier :: Identifier -> Sort
Sort_identifiers :: Identifier -> [Sort] -> Sort
data Attribute_value
Attribute_value_spec_constant :: Spec_constant -> Attribute_value
Attribute_value_symbol :: Symbol -> Attribute_value
Attribute_value_s_expr :: [S_expr] -> Attribute_value
data Attribute
Attribute :: Keyword -> Attribute
Attribute_s_expr :: Keyword -> S_expr -> Attribute
data Qual_identifier
Qual_identifier :: Identifier -> Qual_identifier
Qual_identifier_sort :: Identifier -> Sort -> Qual_identifier
data Var_binding
Var_binding :: Symbol -> Term -> Var_binding
data Sorted_var
Sorted_var :: Symbol -> Sort -> Sorted_var
data Term
Term_spec_constant :: Spec_constant -> Term
Term_qual_identifier :: Qual_identifier -> Term
Term_qual_identifier_ :: Qual_identifier -> [Term] -> Term
Term_distinct :: Term -> [Term] -> Term
Term_let :: [Var_binding] -> Term -> Term
Term_forall :: [Sorted_var] -> Term -> Term
Term_exists :: [Sorted_var] -> Term -> Term
Term_attributes :: Term -> [Attribute] -> Term
data Sort_symbol_decl
Sort_symbol_decl :: Identifier -> Numeral -> [Attribute] -> Sort_symbol_decl
data Meta_spec_constant
Meta_spec_constant_numeral :: Meta_spec_constant
Meta_spec_constant_decimal :: Meta_spec_constant
Meta_spec_constant_string :: Meta_spec_constant
data Fun_symbol_decl
Fun_symbol_decl_spec_constant :: Spec_constant -> Sort -> [Attribute] -> Fun_symbol_decl
Fun_symbol_decl_meta_spec_constant :: Meta_spec_constant -> Sort -> [Attribute] -> Fun_symbol_decl
Fun_symbol_decl :: Identifier -> [Sort] -> [Attribute] -> Fun_symbol_decl
data Par_fun_symbol_decl
Par_fun_symbol_decl :: Fun_symbol_decl -> Par_fun_symbol_decl
Par_fun_symbol_decl_symbols :: [Symbol] -> Identifier -> [Sort] -> [Attribute] -> Par_fun_symbol_decl
data Theory_attribute
Theory_attribute_sorts :: [Sort_symbol_decl] -> Theory_attribute
Theory_attribute_funs :: [Par_fun_symbol_decl] -> Theory_attribute
Theory_attribute_sorts_desc :: String -> Theory_attribute
Theory_attribute_funs_desc :: String -> Theory_attribute
Theory_attribute_definition :: String -> Theory_attribute
Theory_attribute_values :: String -> Theory_attribute
Theory_attribute_notes :: String -> Theory_attribute
Theory_attribute :: Attribute -> Theory_attribute
data Theory_decl
Theory_decl :: Symbol -> [Theory_attribute] -> Theory_decl
data Logic_attribute
Logic_attribute_theories :: [Symbol] -> Logic_attribute
Logic_attribute_language :: String -> Logic_attribute
Logic_attribute_extensions :: String -> Logic_attribute
Logic_attribute_values :: String -> Logic_attribute
Logic_attribute_notes :: String -> Logic_attribute
Logic_attribute :: Attribute -> Logic_attribute
data Logic
Logic :: Symbol -> [Logic_attribute] -> Logic
data Option
Print_success :: Bool -> Option
Expand_definitions :: Bool -> Option
Interactive_mode :: Bool -> Option
Produce_proofs :: Bool -> Option
Produce_unsat_cores :: Bool -> Option
Produce_models :: Bool -> Option
Produce_assignments :: Bool -> Option
Regular_output_channel :: String -> Option
Diagnostic_output_channel :: String -> Option
Random_seed :: Int -> Option
Verbosity :: Int -> Option
Option_attribute :: Attribute -> Option
data Info_flag
Error_behavior :: Info_flag
Name :: Info_flag
Authors :: Info_flag
Version :: Info_flag
Status :: Info_flag
Reason_unknown :: Info_flag
Info_flag :: Keyword -> Info_flag
All_statistics :: Info_flag
data Command
Set_logic :: Symbol -> Command
Set_option :: Option -> Command
Set_info :: Attribute -> Command
Declare_sort :: Symbol -> Numeral -> Command
Define_sort :: Symbol -> [Symbol] -> Sort -> Command
Declare_fun :: Symbol -> [Sort] -> Sort -> Command
Define_fun :: Symbol -> [Sorted_var] -> Sort -> Term -> Command
Push :: Int -> Command
Pop :: Int -> Command
Assert :: Term -> Command
Check_sat :: Command
Get_assertions :: Command
Get_proof :: Command
Get_unsat_core :: Command
Get_value :: [Term] -> Command
Get_assignment :: Command
Get_option :: Keyword -> Command
Get_info :: Info_flag -> Command
Exit :: Command
data Script
Script :: [Command] -> Script
data Gen_response
Unsupported :: Gen_response
Success :: Gen_response
Error :: String -> Gen_response
data Error_behavior
Immediate_exit :: Error_behavior
Continued_execution :: Error_behavior
data Reason_unknown
Timeout :: Reason_unknown
Memout :: Reason_unknown
Incomplete :: Reason_unknown
data Status
Sat :: Status
Unsat :: Status
Unknown :: Status
data Info_response
Info_response_error_behavior :: Error_behavior -> Info_response
Info_response_name :: String -> Info_response
Info_response_authors :: String -> Info_response
Info_response_version :: String -> Info_response
Info_response_status :: Status -> Info_response
Info_response_reason_unknown :: Reason_unknown -> Info_response
Info_response_attribute :: Attribute -> Info_response
type Proof = S_expr
type Valuation_pair = (Term, Term)
type T_valuation_pair = (Symbol, Bool)
data Command_response
Gen_response :: Gen_response -> Command_response
Info_response :: Info_response -> Command_response
Gi_response :: [Info_response] -> Command_response
Cs_response :: Status -> Command_response
Ga_response :: [Term] -> Command_response
Gp_response :: Proof -> Command_response
Guc_response :: [Symbol] -> Command_response
Gv_response :: [Valuation_pair] -> Command_response
Gta_response :: [T_valuation_pair] -> Command_response

-- | Lazily parses an SMT-LIB command script.
parseScript :: String -> Script

-- | Lazily parses an SMT-LIB command responses.
parseResponses :: String -> [Command_response]

-- | Lazily parses an SMT-LIB theory declaration.
parseTheory :: String -> Theory_decl

-- | Lazily parses an SMT-LIB logic.
parseLogic :: String -> Logic

-- | Checks the parsing of a command script.
checkScript :: FilePath -> IO Bool

-- | Checks the parsing of command responses.
checkResponses :: FilePath -> IO Bool

-- | Recursively searches current directory for *.smt2 files to test the
--   parser.
checkParser :: IO ()
instance Show Command_response
instance Show Info_response
instance Show Status
instance Show Reason_unknown
instance Show Error_behavior
instance Show Gen_response
instance Show Script
instance Show Command
instance Show Info_flag
instance Show Option
instance Show Logic
instance Show Logic_attribute
instance Show Theory_decl
instance Show Theory_attribute
instance Show Par_fun_symbol_decl
instance Show Fun_symbol_decl
instance Show Meta_spec_constant
instance Show Sort_symbol_decl
instance Show Term
instance Show Sorted_var
instance Show Var_binding
instance Show Qual_identifier
instance Show Attribute
instance Show Attribute_value
instance Show Sort
instance Show Identifier
instance Show S_expr
instance Show Spec_constant
